Hi everyone, just thought I'd share my baby that I started from scratch. Enjoy

A fine job on the shuttle. I like what you did with the antennae to make cargo bay doors.

How did you balance it so well?

Also, use [noparse]

Javascript is disabled. View full album
[/noparse] to embed albums. Edited October 11, 2014 by Giggleplex777
Interesting use of those antenna dish parts! Never would have thought of that.
Looks great. Stock shuttles are always very rewarding to engineer.

A fine job on the shuttle. I like what you did with the antennae to make cargo bay doors.

How did you balance it so well?

Also, use [noparse]http://imgur.com/a/the characters after the imgur.com/[/noparse] to embed albums.

Good old trial and error haha.
